article: A few weeks ago, I followed a friend into an art supply store.I found him picking out tubes of water-color paint, which  _  me because he's not an artist. "I  _  up for a water-color class, and it starts next week," he said."I really don't have  _  for it, but it was on my list of 50 things to do before I die, so I  went for  it.Every few months I look at the list and decide what to focus on next.  _  I had the list, I complained a lot about what I was  _  in my life.Now I just bury myself in doing these things.Write your own list.and you'll  _  what I mean." So that night.I did just that, and he was right.The list revealed a whole lot about what was  _  to me.It also revealed how  _  behind I am at getting to the things I really want. Eventually I  _  items I've thought about for years, and  _  I've carried with me since I was young.When I  _  he list later, some entries surprised me. First, I want to  _  much more, particularly now that my children are  _  and can go with me to see the world.I would like to take them to bike through Denmark and camp in the Canadian Rockies. I'm also surprised to  _  some things on the list that need to be done soon.If I'm going to learn to roller-blade ,  for instance  , I'd better start before I turn 50. Like my friend, I now have an alternative to  _  .When I'm bored with life, I take out my list.
